attributes.review: This app is the worst app EVER! I tried to download it but it kept telling me no, so I finally punched the app, and it finally agreed to download! Then I had to wait 110089 days for the app to download!!! Ugh 😑, (totally not worth the time), once I finally got to open the app the first thing to pop up was death threat to my family 😱. I got scared so I deleted the app of course, but then my phone got back by little oompaloompas! They stole all of my information!!!! And then to make it worse they showed up at my house and kidnapped my family for 76 day! They finally came home and the were turned into robots!!! “Ahhh” is what I said when I saw them. In conclusion please don’t download this app!
attributes.title: 😡UGHHGHH🤮

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to see what the hype was about and people HACKED my phone 😿 people literally came to my house and cut up me and family and then blended us up into soup and he ATE us ugh! i hate this app with a PASSION because now i can’t live anymore. thank you for listening. ❤️
attributes.title: THIS APP SUCKS😡😾

attributes.title: Unacceptable (doesn’t uphold Christian values)

attributes.review: If I can leave a -11929 rate, I would!!! I wanted to support our king Trump. It kept glitching and sending me rubbish messages. I took me 7 hours to download and once downloaded, it kept SPAMMING me. How rude?! It threatened to show me explicit images if I did not attend rallies 😡my storage was IMMEDIATELY FILLED. I sent a picture to one of the messages and the app told me that I had fat dog and my tv turned off. My dog is a blind survivor 😭 I cried all night at the thought of our handsome dictator bashing my dog. I named my dog Trumpy wumpy because of how much I loved him and thought he loved me 🥺 I went to sleep hours after being on the app and was suffocated by a demon. The demon threw my octagon couch against my tush and killed me. THIS APP WILL HARM YOU. The demon told me to reply to one of the app’s messages “❤️” or my fish would drown! My fish is allergic to WATER!!! My fish saw the message and attempted to commit sewer side 💔😞
attributes.title: Gruesome & God Awful

attributes.review: Hi my name is Caren (with a C 🙈) and I downloaded this app hoping to support my second GOD Mr.Trump, however I was EXTREMELY disappointed to see that he wanted my phone number. Sir Trump I LOVE YOU 🥰😍❤️ but Jesus that is too personal. I did YOU a favor by downloading this app, so you need to do me a favor by making it where I can see all of your definitely non racist, misogynistic, homophobic, or transphobic words on my screen!! 😊 Until that day? One star 😡😡😡
attributes.title: Disappointing!! STEALS INFO

attributes.review: ok where do i begin when i downloaded this app it took 237 hours to download then when it did it asked me for my zip code which made me uncomfortable because i don’t want donald to know what area i live in then an hour after i download it he showed up at my house it was 2:30 in the morning because i didn’t want to get “taken away” by some scary secret service agent i let him in and brought him to my room because i didn’t want his weird high speech to fill anyone’s ears she told me he was hungry so i gave him some mac n cheese then he attacked my favorite brand of mac n cheese but still ate the whole box then up and left me high and dry without sharing any cheesy goodness then 2 hours later texted me and when i didn’t answer he had the audacity to double text i told him that we were over he was a married man and i was 16 this was not ok but all he could say was “vote for trump 2020” and that this type of thing wasn’t his first rodeo and after i read all the claims against him i realized he wasn’t joking. i didn’t know what to do he knew where i lived and had my number so i deleted the app and it killed my 2 beloved guinea pigs i buried them in the back yard and after i got done i walked inside to find both my dogs dead on the floor i blocked his number and told him i was done with him and his app i re downloaded it just to delete it and run it in his face that we were over. i never heard from him again
attributes.title: it gets better just read😉😌

attributes.review: This app tick 2 months to download and when it downloaded it sent freaky stuff about Donald Trump and he message me through my phone and asked me to send toe pictures I immediately deleted the app after that
attributes.title: Ewwww🤮

attributes.review: He called me a porch monkey. Pontificating further, this app is ass. It glitches 24/7 and has many errors
